title: Simple *Crud*
description: This is a simple CRUD, the frontend is very basic with vanilla js, the backend is made with SpringBoot and the database is MySQL.

title: ToDo *API*
description: This is an REST API for a ToDo app, developed on NodeJS using Typescript and mongoose to do the connection with the database on MongoDB

title: ToDo *App*
description: This is a web page that consumes my ToDo API, developed on React with Typescript, and using also Redux

title: La Pinguinera *Quotes*
description: Quoting system for a library, builded with Hexagonal Architecture, Domain Driven Design, Event Sourcing and Reactive Programming for the Use Cases and Controllers. It was developed with .NET Core, C#, and MongoDB
